name: Bazooka Freaks - LD 38
description:
Shoot rockets at up to 11 other players in an orderly turn-based manner, while carefully planning out the trajectory. To make matters worse, you are inside a planet and have to deal with the strangest gravitational forces.

How to play
WASD.....Move
Space.....Jump
Mouse.....Camera
M.....Mute (Toggle between Full Audio, Sounds Only and Mute)

Hold right click to aim, then hold left to build up energy, then release to shoot.

Hint: The red area, that appears around the core when aiming, shows its gravitational field.

Created by
@HueShifted and @70fu_ for Ludum Dare 38
